title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Engineered a scalable backend microservice in Go (Gin) for a TikTok-like influencer application, implementing modules for JWT authentication, S3 storage, and user engagement using a PostgreSQL database.

Significantly enhanced a Python-based RAG chat system (PMA-GPT) using Firebase Functions, OpenAI, and Firestore, implementing advanced chat session/history management and multi-modal analysis (video highlights, PDF summaries).

Architected and built a unified ETL data-pipeline from scratch, automating the ingestion, cleaning, and embedding of company data from diverse sources (YouTube Data API, Wistia API, Ghost API) into a Pinecone vector database.
Developed the backend MVP for an AI-powered supplier quote system using NestJS, MongoDB, and OpenAI, integrating the Gmail API (OAuth) for sending customized, templated emails.
Architected a solution to integrate a Next.js and GraphQL-based AI web app (Vetsie AI) with a WordPress membership system, restricting application access exclusively to paying subscribers.

Engineered a full-stack financial module, developing a NestJS and MySQL backend from scratch to handle Xero API (OAuth) data synchronization, and an Angular frontend with AG Grid to display interactive financial data (balance sheets, transactions, cash flow).
Created and deployed automated workflows using n8n and Make.com to scrape, clean, and process web data, leveraging Gemini and OpenAI for data enrichment and automated email processing.

title: Freelance Backend & AI Developer
responsibilities: Developed and deployed custom Python backends for AI/ML applications, including computer vision and process automation.
Co-developed 'Scam Eye,' a spam detection tool utilizing custom-trained models and OpenAI LLMs.
Built and integrated Node.js (Express) backends with payment gateways (Stripe, PayPal) and third-party APIs (Twilio).
